thread.title: Therese Burkhart
thread.title_full: Frame My TV reviewed by Therese Burkhart

author: Therese Burkhart
title: Therese Burkhart
text: The Wisconsin 2016 Breast Cancer Showhouse featured FRAME MY TV in one of the design rooms. The room featuring FRAME MY TV was one of the favorites of the Showhouse. The home was viewed by thousands over a three week period in the lake country area of Milwaukee, Wisconsin and all proceeds raised from the event went to support breast cancer research. We were delighted to feature FRAME MY TV in one of the rooms of the Showhouse and the visitors to the home were all amazed to see the hidden TV behind the framed art work. It was definitely one of the highlights of the Showhouse!
